scripts.invoke:health: npx serverless invoke local --function health --stage develop
scripts.invoke:create: npx serverless invoke local --function create --stage develop --path ../.resources/data/v2/new-boxes.json
scripts.invoke:createDirectv: npx serverless invoke local --function createDirectv --stage develop --path ../.resources/data/v2/new-boxes-directv.json
scripts.invoke:updateChannel: npx serverless invoke local --function updateChannel --stage develop --path ../.resources/data/v2/update-box-live.json
scripts.invoke:get: npx serverless invoke local --function get --stage develop --path ../.resources/data/box-get.json
scripts.invoke:getAll: npx serverless invoke local --function getAll --stage develop --path ../.resources/data/box-get.json
